players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Bob.
The villager Bob was found dead.
Beware, Charlie is the detective and discovered you're the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
Diana: "Bob was killed, so the mafia is active. We should vote for Charlie. He seems suspicious."
You: "Charlie, you found me? Why didn't you investigate anyone else? That seems suspicious. Maybe you're lying."
Charlie: "Alice, I found you are mafia. Vote for Alice."
Charlie: "Alice, I investigated you and you are mafia. Vote for Alice. Bob was killed by mafia. Trust me, I am the detective."
You: "Charlie, if you were detective you'd investigate Bob and find him villager. You didn't mention that, so maybe you're lying. Vote for me."
Diana: "I think Charlie is mafia. He never mentioned investigating Bob. Alice claims to be detective, but her accusation of Charlie is unsubstantiated. Vote Charlie."

players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the villager.
Day 1 begins.

players.name: Charlie
memory: You're Charlie, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Bob was found dead.
You investigated Alice and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Beware, Alice knows you're the detective.
Day 1 begins.
Diana: "Bob was killed, so the mafia is active. We should vote for Charlie. He seems suspicious."
Alice: "Charlie, you found me? Why didn't you investigate anyone else? That seems suspicious. Maybe you're lying."
You: "Alice, I found you are mafia. Vote for Alice."
You: "Alice, I investigated you and you are mafia. Vote for Alice. Bob was killed by mafia. Trust me, I am the detective."
Alice: "Charlie, if you were detective you'd investigate Bob and find him villager. You didn't mention that, so maybe you're lying. Vote for me."
Diana: "I think Charlie is mafia. He never mentioned investigating Bob. Alice claims to be detective, but her accusation of Charlie is unsubstantiated. Vote Charlie."
Votes: Alice voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Alice, Diana voted for Alice (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format)
Alice was arrested
